settings.heading: Keep Living
settings.text: A reminder to overcome fear, depression, and hopelessness. Make it through that moment, that day, that hard time.

settings.title: Featured Collection
settings.description: Products to remind you to keep going.

settings.heading: Why KeepLiving Exists
settings.text: I've been where you are. The fear, the depression, the feeling that it won't get better. But I kept living. One moment at a time. One day at a time.
